keepConnect.name: Komeza guhuza
keepConnect.helperText: Niba ukanze kumurongo wo gutangira, hanyuma ukomeze umurongo. Ibi bisaba kwitondera ko umurongo uzahuzwa ubudahwema nyuma yo guhagarikwa.

url.name: Url
url.helperText: Ihuza URL, urugero ws: //192.168.0.2: 7001, cyangwa WST: //urugero.com/ibihe
url.error: URL yukuri ni URL itangirana na ws: // cyangwa wws: //
